#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
#include <sstream>
 
#define ULL unsigned long long
using namespace std;
char str[1000];
ULL x;
void removeSoCalledX();
int main(){
int t,i,n,n2,n5;
int ans;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--){
scanf("%s",str);
removeSoCalledX();
stringstream ss(str);
ans = 1; n2 = 0; n5 = 0,n=0;
while(ss>>x){
// printf("[%d]",x);
if(x == 0){
ans = 0;
break;
}
while(x%2 == 0){
x/=2;
n--;
}
while(x%5 == 0){
x/=5;
n++;
}
ans = (ans*(x%10))%10;
}//end while
for(i=0;i<-n;i++)
ans = (ans*2)%10;
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
ans = (ans*5)%10;
if(ans){
printf("%d\n",ans);
}else{
printf("Robot hanged.\n");
}
}//end while
//getch();
return 0;
}

void removeSoCalledX(){
int i;
for(i=0;i<strlen(str);i++){
if(str[i]<'0'|| str[i]>'9')
str[i]=' ';
}
}
